Description: Painted wooden shabti with a black lappet-wig with yellow braids, a brown face with coloured features, a yellow and blue collar, brown hands in low relief holding two red hoes, the body is white(worn), the backs of the arms are decorated with two representations of red and yellow seed-baskets.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
